title: Project Setup
description: Initialize Next.js project, set up Firebase, and configure project structure
notes: Completed setup of Next.js with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Firebase integration. Created basic project structure with components and pages for the social polling application.
logs: Project setup completed with Next.js and Firebase

title: Database Schema Design
description: Design the Firebase database schema for polls, answers, and votes
notes: Defined data structures for polls, poll options, user votes, and user upvotes. Implemented Firestore integration and created helper functions for database operations.
suggested_tests: Test creating and retrieving poll data

title: Core Poll Creation Feature
description: Implement the ability for users to create polls with questions and multiple answers
notes: Created form for submitting new polls with multiple answer options. Implemented validation and database integration.
suggested_tests: Test poll creation with various numbers of answers

title: Poll Feed Implementation
description: Create the feed interface showing all polls with their questions
notes: Implemented feed layout, sorting by popularity, and poll display cards with loading states and empty states.

title: Answer Poll Feature
description: Allow users to select answers to polls and record their responses
notes: Implemented the ability to answer polls and record responses in Firebase with proper UI feedback.
suggested_tests: Test preventing multiple answers from same user

title: Results Visibility After Participation
description: Implement the feature to show poll results only after participation
notes: Added conditional rendering to show results with percentages and total votes after user answers.
suggested_tests: Test results are hidden before answering
Test results display correctly after answering

title: Upvoting System
description: Implement the ability to upvote questions with limit of one upvote per question per user
notes: Added upvote functionality and tracking of user upvotes with Firebase integration.
suggested_tests: Test one upvote per user per question limit

title: Feed Sorting by Popularity
description: Sort the feed to show most upvoted questions at the top
notes: Implemented sorting algorithm based on upvotes using Firestore query ordering.
suggested_tests: Test sorting order changes when upvotes change

title: UI/UX Enhancement
description: Improve UI to make it modern and delightful, inspired by Robinhood, Hinge, and Airbnb
notes: Added modern UI styling with Tailwind CSS, including animations, color schemes, and intuitive interactions.

title: Initial Poll Data
description: Add the three sample questions to the database
notes: Added a seeding script with the specified sample questions about Duke bars, Brittany Brady, and baby births.
suggested_tests: Verify sample questions appear in feed
